Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a high-value asset at a reduced cost. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this innovative solution to your organization. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
